title: HackTheBox Cyber Apocalypse CTF
summary: A well-balanced CTF with creative challenges spanning multiple categories. The space-themed storyline added an engaging narrative to technical problem-solving.

title: picoCTF 2024
summary: Excellent entry-point CTF for newcomers. Progressive difficulty curve with comprehensive educational resources and detailed hints for learning.

title: CSAW CTF Qualification
summary: Challenging qualifier with innovative problems in reverse engineering and exploitation. Strong emphasis on real-world vulnerability research.

title: Google CTF 2024
summary: Google's premier CTF featuring cutting-edge challenges in hardware security, AI/ML attacks, and advanced cryptanalysis techniques.

title: DarkCON CTF
summary: Underground-themed CTF with focus on OSINT and social engineering challenges. Unique approach to information gathering and analysis.

title: BSides SF CTF
summary: Community-driven CTF with practical security challenges. Great mix of technical depth and accessibility for intermediate players.
